title: Nikkei rises to near 2-month high after ECB signals more stimulus
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
TOKYO, Oct 23 (Reuters) - Japan's Nikkei share average rose sharply to a near two-month high on Friday after European Central Bank President...
